html:
April 8 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Airtel Africa, Bellway Plc and Volvo AB, on Thursday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Airtel Africa AAF.L: JP Morgan raises to overweight from neutral

* Bellway Plc BWY.L: BofA Global Research raises to neutral from underperform

* Sage Group SGE.L: Citigroup raises to buy from neutral

* Unilever ULVR.L: Societe Generale cuts to sell from buy

* Volvo AB VOLVb.ST: SocGen raises to buy from hold


Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Thursday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.


* A.P. Moller-Maersk MAERSKb.CO: HSBC raises target price to DKK 19300 from DKK 17000

* AB Foods ABF.L: UBS raises price target to 2800p from 2400p

* Airbus Group AIR.PA: JP Morgan cuts price target to EUR 115 from EUR 120

* Airtel Africa AAF.L: JP Morgan raises price target to 100p from 72p

* Airtel Africa AAF.L: JP Morgan raises to overweight from neutral

* Alpha Financial Markets Consulting Plc AFM.L: Berenberg raises target to 310p from 280p

* Alpha Financial Markets Consulting Plc AFM.L: RBC raises target price to 310p from 265p

* Amundi SA AMUN.PA: BofA Global Research raises price objective to EUR 89 from EUR 85

* Amundi SA AMUN.PA: Kepler Cheuvreux raises target price to EUR 86.2 from EUR 83.2

* Anglo American AAL.L: Jefferies raises price target to 3800p from 3600p

* Asos Plc ASOS.L: JP Morgan raises target price to 6800p from 6700p

* Assa Abloy AB ASSAb.ST: BofA Global Research ups price objective to SEK 275 from SEK 240

* Atlas Copco AB ATCOa.ST: BofA Global Research ups price objective to SEK 585 from SEK 565

* Avantium NV AVTX.AS: KBC Securities raises target to EUR 3 from EUR 1.75; rating reduce

* Beiersdorf AG BEIG.DE: Independent Research raises PT to EUR 97 from EUR 90; rating hold

* Beiersdorf AG BEIG.DE: UBS raises price target to EUR 82 from EUR 80

* Bellway Plc BWY.L: BofA Global Research raises to neutral from underperform

* British Land BLND.L: UBS raises price target to 560p from 520p

* Bureau Veritas BVI.PA: Berenberg raises target price to EUR 27 from EUR 25.5
